definition: the (rightful) emperor/"Son of Heaven" (traditional English translation)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
new emperor, new officials (idiom)/a new chief brings in new aides
pinyin: yi1 chao2 tian1 zi3 yi1 chao2 chen2

definition: (expr.) hold the feudal overlord and you control his vassals
pinyin: xie2 tian1 zi3 yi3 ling4 zhu1 hou2

definition: (expr.) hold the feudal overlord and you control the whole country
pinyin: xie2 tian1 zi3 yi3 ling4 tian1 xia4

sentences.english: You've just met that special person.
sentences.chinese: 你遇到的就是你的真命天子。

sentences.english: Maybe you can find your Mr. Right.
sentences.chinese: 也许你会找到你的真命天子呢。

sentences.english: We then got to view statues of the 18 levels of Hell and the torture methods used within.
sentences.chinese: 我们还参观了十八层地狱和阴天子的严拷方式。

sentences.english: Mr. Great may be right in front of you.
sentences.chinese: 真命天子可能就在眼前。

sentences.english: His riches were the possession of all within the four seas.
sentences.chinese: 尊为天子，富有四海之内。

sentences.english: In the year 1630 this beloved wife of the emperor died.
sentences.chinese: 在1630年，这位备受天子溺爱的皇妃死了。

sentences.english: Hi, I'm Mr. Right. Someone said you were looking for me.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，我叫真命天子，听说你在找我。

sentences.english: No doubt about it, this is your soul mate.
sentences.chinese: 别怀疑，他就是你的真命天子。

sentences.english: No doubt about it , this is your soul mate .
sentences.chinese: 别怀疑，他就是你的真命天子。

sentences.english: Youyue 'Taiping Emperor Asamoto day, North and South sub-chiang to the battlefield'.
sentences.chinese: 又曰‘太平天子朝元日，南北分疆作战场’。

sentences.english: For example, we went to the Tianzi Mountain and Baofeng Lake.
sentences.chinese: 譬如，我们去了天子山和宝峰湖。

sentences.english: The Emperor Xuan Lin Hou give India, general wear out Ming palace.
sentences.chinese: 天子临轩赐侯印，将军佩出明光宫。

sentences.english: The number nine, being the highest value digit, symbolically represented the emperor.
sentences.chinese: 数字九是最高的实数，也指九五至尊的天子。

sentences.english: Thousands of years of history. The newspaper nameless, a heart of pure loyalty.
sentences.chinese: 千年史册耻无名，一片丹心报天子。

sentences.english: Jifa, king Wu of Zhou Dynasty, was the first person known as the emperor in the history of China.
sentences.chinese: 周武王姬发是在中国历史上，第一个被称为天子的人。

sentences.english: No one would label Putin a child of destiny.
sentences.chinese: 没人会把普京称为“真命天子”。

definition: the most senior minister of many kingdoms or dynasties (with varying roles)/prime minister
courtier's or minister's form of address for the current Emperor
Taishang Huang/Retired Emperor/father of the reigning emperor/fig. puppet master
member of a monarch's inner ministerial circle (old)

feudal vassal/feudal princes, esp. the monarchs (dukes or princes) of the several vassal states 諸侯國|诸侯国 of Zhou during Western Zhou and Spring and Autumn periods 11th-5th century BC/subordinate warlord/local official
former kings/former emperors/in Confucian writing, refers esp. to the sage rulers Yao 堯|尧[Yao2], Shun 舜[Shun4], Yu 禹[Yu3], Tang 湯|汤[Tang1] and the kings of Zhou
